title: Clinic Courtyard Kickoff
setting: Bright hospital courtyard with river-like path and arrow markers like a map
visual_prompt: Three cheerful Latin American research interns in colorful explorer outfits outside Mayo Clinic Jacksonville, holding clipboards; Dora-style bold outlines, speech bubbles, playful arrows pointing toward the aorta diagram.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Hola! Ready to map Type 2 endoleaks?

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Sí, let's explore the hidden flow paths!

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Dr. Erben wants clear visuals and data.

title: Goal Map
setting: Whiteboard with treasure-map arrows leading to a drawn aneurysm sac
visual_prompt: Comic-style whiteboard with sketched aorta and aneurysm sac, treasure map arrows pointing to side branches; interns point with colorful markers.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Objective: 30 scenes, cada paso claro.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Story must teach without extra text.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Speech bubbles carry the science!

title: Define Type 2
setting: Close-up of aneurysm diagram with incoming and outgoing arrows
visual_prompt: Aorta cutaway, aneurysm sac, small lumbar artery feeding retrograde flow; bright labels and dotted arrows.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Type 2 = retrograde inflow from branches.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Not a leak at the seal, sino colaterales.

title: Flow Mechanism
setting: Magnified view of lumbar artery into sac
visual_prompt: Zoomed lumen with swirling contrast, smiling arrows, stylized bone landmarks.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Lumbar or IMA feed in, pressure keeps sac perfused.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Outcome depends on sac growth.

title: Risk Signal
setting: Measuring tape around aneurysm sac drawing
visual_prompt: Cartoon sac with tape measure, green check for stable, red arrow for >5 mm growth.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Stable sac? We watch.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Growth >5 mm? Intervention time.

title: Imaging Plan
visual_prompt: CTA scanner drawn friendly; checklist bubbles: arterial phase, delayed phase, source vessel hunt.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: CTA arterial plus delayed to catch slow flow.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Buscamos el vaso que alimenta el saco.

title: CTA Frames
visual_prompt: Two panels inside one: early frame pale, delayed frame brighter sac blush; arrows highlight blush.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Delayed blush confirms persistent inflow.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Comparo diámetros: ¿crece el saco?

title: Source Vessel Hunt
setting: Stylized map overlay on CT image
visual_prompt: CT-like grayscale with colored arrows tracing lumbar artery into sac; magnifying glass icon.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Aquí entra la lumbar, mira la flecha.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Target identified; plan embolization route.

title: Team Check-in
setting: Hallway with Dr. Young Erben on screen
visual_prompt: Video call tablet with Dr. Erben smiling, interns thumbs-up.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: Evidence first: show sac trend and vessel map.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Tenemos los datos listos!

title: Observation Path
visual_prompt: Simple flowchart: stable sac -> observe -> schedule CTA; icons of calendar and happy sac.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Mitad se resuelve sola en 6 meses.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Seguimos vigilando con CTA seriado.

title: Intervention Path
visual_prompt: Flowchart path glowing red: sac growth -> plan embolization; catheter icon.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Si crece >5 mm, tocamos el saco.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Elegimos la ruta: transarterial o translumbar.

title: Transarterial Route
visual_prompt: Colorful catheter snake entering lumbar artery toward sac; coil icons.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Cateterizamos la lumbar con microcatéter 2.0F.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Coils primero, luego Onyx si queda espacio.

title: Translumbar Route
setting: Needle path through back into sac
visual_prompt: Posterior approach with needle entering sac; shielded spine backdrop.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Ruta directa si arterias tortuosas.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Precisión con angioCT para evitar raíz lumbar.

title: Novel Idea Spark
visual_prompt: 3D printed sac model with glow; lightbulb comic effect; interns pointing.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: ¿Y si mapeamos flujo con microburbujas persistentes?

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Podemos cuantificar duración del blush.

title: Microbubble Tracker
visual_prompt: CEUS-style screen with bright bubbles swirling into sac, timer overlay.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Medimos wash-in y wash-out en segundos.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Límite: si >60 s, mayor riesgo de crecimiento.

title: Dual-Phase CTA Overlay
visual_prompt: Split-screen slider merging arterial and delayed CTA frames; color overlay on sac.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Fusionamos fases para localizar inflow exacto.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Esto guía el microcatéter directamente.

title: Pressure Monitoring
visual_prompt: Small pressure gauge icon tapped into sac; gauge needle dropping after test embolization.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Idea: micro sensor en catéter para presión de saco.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Si cae, sabemos que sellamos bien.

title: Outcome Data Wall
visual_prompt: Poster showing success rates: resolution 70-80%, recurrence 10-20%; chart arrows.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Datos: resolución 70-80% con embolización selectiva.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Recurrencia 10-20%, por eso seguimiento.

title: Patient Talk
visual_prompt: Friendly counseling scene; anatomical model on table.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Explicamos: no es fuga del stent, son ramas pequeñas.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Plan: vigilar, y si crece, sellar con coils o pegamento.

title: Sterile Prep
visual_prompt: Comic catheter lab with blue drapes; checklists floating.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Checklist: anticoagulación, acceso, microcatéter listo.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Recordamos fluoroscopia baja dosis.

title: Coil Deployment
visual_prompt: Coils spiraling into sac; contrast swirl stops; celebratory sparkles.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Coils hasta estasis; Onyx si persiste flujo lento.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Control con angiografía final.

title: Post-Procedure CTA
visual_prompt: CTA slice showing thrombosed sac without blush; green checkmark.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: A las 6-12 semanas, CTA sin realce.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Confirmamos diámetro estable o menor.

title: Pilot Study Draft
visual_prompt: Poster with bullet points: CEUS microbubble persistence, sac pressure probe, overlay tool.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Hipótesis: burbuja >60 s predice expansión.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Probaremos en 20 pacientes consecutivos.

title: Sample Size Debate
visual_prompt: Calculator, coffee cups, charts; playful arrows.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Poder 80%, alfa 0.05, necesitamos 34 casos.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Agreguemos margen por pérdidas al seguimiento.

title: Ethics Reminder
visual_prompt: Consent form with heart icon, clipboard sticker 'IRB'; friendly tone.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Consentimiento informado claro y bilingüe.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Riesgos mínimos, beneficio potencial alto.

title: Data Capture
visual_prompt: Laptop screen showing live sac diameter chart; cloud icon for registry.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Capturamos diámetro, blush time, presión intra-saco.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Usamos hoja REDCap con alerts automáticos.

title: Result Teaser
visual_prompt: Upward and flat lines comparing growth vs stable; bubbles labeled fast vs slow wash-out.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Si wash-out lento correlaciona, cambiamos algoritmo.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Intervenimos antes en altos riesgos.

title: Teaching Moment
visual_prompt: Whiteboard with three bullets: identify source, measure sac, choose approach.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Tres pasos: localizar, medir, decidir ruta.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Siempre revisar fases retardadas, siempre.

title: Future Tech Dream
visual_prompt: Tablet showing holographic artery overlay on patient abdomen; playful stars.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Sueño: AR que muestre la arteria culpable en vivo.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Y que guíe el microcatéter como GPS.

title: Wrap-Up with Dr. Erben
visual_prompt: Interns present poster to Dr. Erben; smiley stickers.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: Buen trabajo: ciencia clara, visual y medible.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Listos para enrolar pacientes y publicar!

title: Patient Success
visual_prompt: Happy patient walking with cane, sac diagram showing shrinkage.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Saco 5 mm más pequeño, sin blush.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Seguimiento anual y fin.

title: Future Paper
visual_prompt: Mock journal cover titled 'Type 2 Endoleak Flow Dynamics'; celebratory confetti.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Enviamos manuscrito con cohort y CEUS data.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Compartimos código y modelos 3D abiertos.
